_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
rationale: Wider profit zone than butterfly, still defined risk

entry_conditions.notes: Long condor: defined risk bet on price staying between inner strikes. Wider profit zone than butterfly but lower max profit. Good when range-bound but unsure of exact pin.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Difference between outer and inner strikes - net debit (if price between inner strikes at expiry)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Price stays between inner strikes at expiration
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Theta â€” positive when price in profit zone near expiry

greeks_profile.theta: mixed â€” positive near expiry in profit zone, negative otherwise
greeks_profile.vega: slightly negative â€” benefits from IV decrease near expiry
greeks_profile.gamma: mixed â€” depends on proximity to strikes

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Price stays between inner strikes (590-610) through expiry. Wider zone of profitability vs butterfly.
